memberdef.definition: void(* s_gemv_f32) (const float *, const float *, float *, size_t, size_t, const float *, size_t)
memberdef.argsstring: )(const float *, const float *, float *, size_t, size_t, const float *, size_t)
memberdef.name: s_gemv_f32

briefdescription.para: Installed float GEMV kernel (defaults to generic C).

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_f32_avx2_impl

briefdescription.para: AVX2/FMA GEMV (float path), provided by gemv_avx2.c.

detaileddescription.para:
This symbol is optional; the dispatcher checks CPU features before use.
AVX2/FMA GEMV (float path), provided by gemv_avx2.c.

The implementation accepts either plain row-major W or rows packed as "blocked-K contiguous" (see pretranspose docs). In the latter case, each row still has cols elements but the inner loop can iterate in chunks of blk_k to promote cache locality.

parameterdescription.para: Weights (row-major or blocked-K contiguous per row).
Optional bias (length rows), may be NULL.
Column block size; 0 => treat as single block of size cols.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qi8_f32_avx2_impl

briefdescription.para: AVX2/FMA GEMV with INT8 activations (per-tensor params).

detaileddescription.para:
Optional symbol. The dispatcher guards its use with a CPU feature test.
AVX2/FMA GEMV with INT8 activations (per-tensor params).
This path dequantizes activations into a temporary aligned float buffer, then calls the AVX2 float GEMV core ie_gemv_f32_avx2_impl().

parameterdescription.para: Column block size; 0 => treat as single block.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k)
memberdef.name: gemv_generic_impl

briefdescription.para: Generic C GEMV: y = W * x (+bias), optional blocked-K layout.

detaileddescription.para: The routine multiplies a row-major (or "blocked-K contiguous") matrix W by a dense vector x, accumulating into y. If blk_k is non-zero, the inner loop processes chunks of size blk_k to better match cache lines.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to weights (row-major; each row has cols floats).
Number of rows in W and y.
Number of columns in W and length of x.
Optional bias to add per-output row (may be NULL).
Column block size; set 0 to disable blocking.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: gemv_qi8_f32_fused_c_impl

briefdescription.para: GEMV with per-tensor INT8 activations (fused dequantization), C path.

detaileddescription.para: Dequantization model: real = scale * (q - zero_point). This function multiplies float weights by dequantized INT8 activations without materializing a separate float vector.

parameterdescription.para: Column block size; 0 means plain row-major.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, size_t group_size, const float *scales, const int8_t *zeros, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: gemv_qi8pg_f32_fused_c_impl

briefdescription.para: GEMV with per-group INT8 activations (fused dequantization), C path.

detaileddescription.para: Each contiguous group of group_size elements in x_q uses its own (scale, zero). The last group may be shorter.

briefdescription.para: Decode FP8 E4M3 value to float (flush subnormals).
Decode FP8 E5M2 value to float (IEEE-like; NaNs/Inf handled).

simplesect.para: 32-bit float approximation (quiet NaN for FP8 NaN payloads).

briefdescription.para: Install the best available float GEMV kernel for this process.

detaileddescription.para: Install the best available CPU kernels at runtime.
On x86 with GCC/Clang, the dispatcher uses __builtin_cpu_supports("avx2") and prefers the AVX2 implementation when available; otherwise it installs the generic C fallback.

parameterdescription.para: Non-zero to allow AVX2 selection when supported.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_f32

briefdescription.para: Dispatch GEMV (float path) to the installed kernel.

detaileddescription.para: GEMV: y[r] = dot(W[r, :], x) [+ bias[r]] for r in [0, rows).

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qi8_f32

briefdescription.para: GEMV with per-tensor INT8 activations, auto-dispatch (AVX2 or C).

parameterdescription.para: Column block size; 0 means plain row-major.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, size_t group_size, const float *scales, const int8_t *zeros, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qi8pg_f32

briefdescription.para: GEMV with per-group INT8 activations (fused), C fallback.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const uint8_t *x_fp8, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_fp8_format fmt)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qfp8_f32

briefdescription.para: GEMV with FP8 activations (E4M3/E5M2), fused decode (C fallback).

parameterdescription.para: Column block size; 0 means plain row-major.
